Title: A new Nation's Report Card shows drops in science, math and reading scores
Description:
It's the first Nation's Report Card since the Trump administration began making cuts to the U.S.
Education Department.
The scores reflect the state of student achievement in early 2024.

Title: SCOTUS lifts limits on LA raids. And, Nation's Report Card shows drops in scores
Description:
The Supreme Court on Monday issued an order clearing the way for agents to resume aggressive immigration sweeps in LA.
And, a new Nation's Report Card shows drops in science, math and reading scores.

Title: Little logos, big profits: People can't get enough of golf course merch
Description:
Golf clubs are leveraging merch hype and transforming logos into collectible trophies.
It's driving even more revenue for the thriving US golf market.

Title: Inside the behind the scenes battle for the future of the web
Description:

Big Tech is pushing back.

Title: Bears rue opportunity lost in Johnson's debut
Description: In Chicago's first regular-season game under coach Ben Johnson, Caleb Williams and the Bears saw a second-half lead slip in a 27-24 loss to the division rival Minnesota Vikings at Soldier Field Monday, a contest the hosts led,17-6, in the third quarter.

Title: YouTube Is a Mysterious Monopoly
Description:

He runs Adrian’s Digital Basement, a retro computer repair channel I really enjoy.
